articles.title: More than 1,000 calls to cricket inquiry
articles.description: More than 1,000 people contacted an inquiry into discrimination in cricket in the past week amid the Azeem Rafiq racism scandal.
articles.content:
'It's important we don't let this moment go' - Azeem Rafiq speaks to BBC sports editor Dan Roan
